content:
Announcing [Micropublish](https://micropublish.herokuapp.com/about): the tool I use to post on my personal #indieweb site via #micropub 

(I've been using it for a couple of weeks now to post everything on here, including this post).
summary: Announcing Micropublish: the tool I use to post on my personal #indieweb site via #micropub https://micropublish.herokuapp.com/about https://barryf.s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/micropublish.png
